@Telstra have called that number on other occasions.... same waiting times & staff have no idea what's going on. HOPELESS SERVICE
@Telstra 1-1005501967009, unbelievable time on hold, re-directs between departments. Had to hang up after 84 minutes today, prev occas 2hrs+
@Telstra OUTSOURCED overseas call centres where staff knows nothing... On hold, technical faults!!! What a joke! Australians deserve better!
Connecting a cable service with @Telstra? 6km from Adelaide GPO, new dwelling. > 6 weeks + hours on the phone = NO RESULT. R we in 2017?

Yes! Buy in from patients is greater than pills with appropriate 'doctoring' = teaching @drjohnm @PrashSanders @drrpathak @LisaRosenbaum17
Hope the water didn't run out... Awesome @emirates planes and service. Hope you enjoyed an extra glass of Dom 2006 too! @PrashSanders

Every wine has a story... this carafe might steal the limelight! A great piece of art. We want one! @Elliott_AD @PrashSanders
More options for ADL travellers to bypass transit in Eastern domestic airports! Great news... @PrashSanders https://t.co/HAQymA2sNJ
What's wrong with @Qantas customer care? asked by QFF staff to lodge issue with online customer care. 1 month past & still no reply!
Excellent service by cabin crew on @emirates EK440 DXB-ADL today. Made up for the kerfuffles earlier on in London with @Qantas delays
@aphilp01 yes. The incoming flight is delayed. If you are on QF2, you are likely to get into Adelaide late morning...
Unfortunately staff on the phone seems to be under trained. The experience was suboptimal. 1 hour phone call fr London, total waste of time
@Qantas Flights out of LHR delayed.. Took over 60 mins on phone to get alternative arrangements 'half' sorted. Needs more efficiency!
@Elliott_AD presenting at #ESCcongress YIA on Cardiorespiratory fitness and AF outcome. @UniofAdelaide @PrashSanders http://t.co/FGPuaP4vbN
Managing obese #afib patients by @PrashSanders at #ESCcongress. Insights from LEGACY and CARDIOFIT studies @drrpathak http://t.co/anOaynWr0L
@PrashSanders a string of bad experiences with @Qantas of late... Surprised you didn't come back to ADL this morning. Fly @emirates tonite
Premier Jay Weatherill driverless car trial to start on Adelaideâ€™s Southern Expressway in November http://t.co/ECnjElrJP8
Lifestyle & aggressive risk factor mx reverses #afib substrate! Key to favorable rhythm outcome. #ehraeuropace @PrashSanders @drrpathak
@PrashSanders presenting lifestyle mx to improve outcomes of #afib ablation. Lifestyle mx is new anti-arrhythmic! #ehraeuropace
Fantastic venue for the faculty dinner at Museo Diocesano di Milano #ehraeuropace. Kudos to the organisers! http://t.co/wvqE3056Jk
The Cardio-Fit study published online in JACC. Congrats @drrpathak @PrashSanders @UniofAdelaide #ehraeuropace http://t.co/WBQdMtwkwE

Well delivered talk by @J_Hendriks1 on integrated AF care clinic to improve outcomes in #afib patients at #ehraeuropace #chrd @CVC_Adelaide
Congrats to @pawelkkk55 for best abstract award #ehraeuropace on technical challenges & phase singularity. Best wishes @CVC_Adelaide #chrd
Practical approach to MRI and CIEDs. Requures coordinated effort between cardiology, radiology, nurses, physics. @MayoClinic #ehraeuropace
Heterogeneity & complexity of #AFib = much more difficult to manage than CHF/MI. More translational research needed https://t.co/O3tKY9P3TH
Excellent talk by H. Hoegh Petersen on MRI in non-conditional CIEDs. #ehraeuropace Not mandatory to implant conditional CIEDs in all pts...
2010 Hill of Grace launch dinner at #hillofgrace restaurant Adelaide oval. Magnificent! http://t.co/qH69OTxNbL
@drrpathak @PrashSanders be careful, running is addictive! Remember to get get a good pair of running shoes and protect the joints...
Late Breaker ACC.15 - Great interview by @drrpathak on weight loss & #AF. @CVC_Adelaide @SAHMRI_Heart @prashsanders http://t.co/QQwP1mJLNq
"@sonyxperia: #Xperia M4 Aqua: http://t.co/MDDICsSC7X" same rating as the z3. Can't trust the ads since this failed miserably on my z3!
@sonyxperia @Sony unfortunately my z3 didn't perform as advertised. Failed waterproof claim and dead. Guess not all tested at the factory!
Disappointed that #sonyxperiaz3 failed waterproof claim. Spoiled an otherwise good vacation! @sonyxperia

Thanks to @Pebble with @Jawbone app for activity tracking. Survived the holidays with 10days on a cruise and zero #weightgain!
@PrashSanders now I expect you to diffuse some of this knowledge on wine and food pairing when we drink together in the new year!
@PrashSanders you must had far better wines and food than the cruise ship had to offer
